home.description: I'm a software developer with experience in TypeScript, JavaScript, Angular, React and Node.js.

hero.description: specializing in building exceptional digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a junior software developer with experience in full-stack web application development, focusing more on the front-end. I'm passionate about creating efficient, easy-to-maintain solutions to technical challenges.

animeBlog.title: Anime's Blog
animeBlog.description: An anime blog created as part of a challenge, featuring an attractive design, easy navigation, and features designed to engage fans of the genre.

BuzzfeedQuiz.title: Buzzfeed Quiz
BuzzfeedQuiz.description: An interactive personality quiz that challenges you to discover whether your essence is that of a hero or a villain.

PomodoroStudies.title: Pomodoro Studies
PomodoroStudies.description: A study timer that lets you add tasks and automatically marks them as completed when the timer ends.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out!
